Package aom.scripting.xs.kb

Class Army

Object
Army
public class Army
extends Object
This class provides a collection of KB commands concerning Armies. An army is a logical grouping of units. Units can only be part of 1 army and an army can only consist of 30 unit max.

All army functions require a proper context player.

Armies from "group" parameters in triggers come in the form "player, armyID" (without quotes), so can be extracted using e.g. int armyID = xsVectorGetY(vector(%army%,0));.

Armies 1 through 9 are the player's selection groups (the banners in the top left corner of a screen) and always exist. They are correctly filled with the selected units, but modifying them has no effect for the player.

Army 10 is the army "11" one usually creates first in the editor and only exists if created, just like any further armies.

Author:
Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
